Name: Delatolla Gravity Settling
Summary: Protocol for gravity settling of post-grit wastewater samples (PGS).

Summary: Protocol for separating the solid fraction of post-grit wastewater samples (PGS).

Summary: Full PEG-based solid separation and sample concentration protocol.

Name: N1 primer and probe mix for PCR
Summary: Reactions were comprised of 1.5 μl of RNA template input, 500 nM each of forward and reverse primers along with 125 nM of the probes in a final reaction volume of 10μl. Samples were run in triplicate.

Name: Protocol for a single denaturation and annealing/lengthening cycle
Summary: 45 cycles of denaturation, annealing/extension at 95°C/10 s, then 60°C/30 s, respectively.

Name: Full RTqPCR thermocycle protocol for quantification
Summary: Using a CFX Connect qPCR thermocycler (Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA), RT was performed at 50°C, 10 minutes, followed by polymerase activation at 95°C for 10 minutes, and 45 cycles of denaturation, annealing/extension at 95°C/10 s, then 60°C/30 s, respectively.

Name: Full RTqPCR protocol for the quantification of SARS-CoV-2 N1 allele
Summary: Singleplex, probe-based, one-step RT-qPCR (Reliance One-Step Multiplex RT-qPCR Supermix (Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA) was performed in this study using the 2019-nCoV Assay-RUO probe/primers mixes for CDC N1 and N2 gene regions (IDT, Kanata, Canada). All utilized primer/probe sets, their sequences and their sources (including PMMoV and VSV) are described below in Supplemental Table 3. Reactions were comprised of 1.5 μl of RNA template input, 500 nM each of forward and reverse primers along with 125 nM of the probes in a final reaction volume of 10μl. Samples were run in triplicate. Using a CFX Connect qPCR thermocycler (Bio-Rad, Hercules, CA), RT was performed at 50°C, 10 minutes, followed by polymerase activation at 95°C for 10 minutes, and 45 cycles of denaturation, annealing/extension at 95°C/10 s, then 60°C/30 s, respectively.
